Package org.apache.polygene.api.structure

Application Structure API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Application
    The Application represents a whole Polygene application.
    ApplicationDescriptor
    Application Descriptor.
    Layer
    The Layer represents a single layer in a Polygene application.
    LayerDescriptor
    Layer Descriptor.
    MetaInfoHolder
    MetaInfo holder.
    Module
    API for interacting with a Module.
    ModuleDescriptor
    Module Descriptor.
    TypeLookup  
    UsedLayersDescriptor
    Used Layers Descriptor.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Application.Mode
    Application modes.
